home.faq1Q: What is the CIC DevB Smart Site Safety System and how do your solutions comply?
home.faq1A: The CIC DevB Smart Site Safety System is a set of requirements issued by the Hong Kong Construction Industry Council and Development Bureau to enhance construction site safety through technology. Our IoT solutions — including smart helmets, environmental sensors, AI surveillance, and access control — are designed and tested to fully comply with these standards, ensuring your site meets all regulatory requirements.
home.faq2Q: Where do you source your IoT hardware?
home.faq2A: We partner with leading global IoT manufacturers and source certified, industrial-grade hardware that meets international safety and quality standards. All devices are rigorously tested for Hong Kong's construction site conditions, including high humidity, dust, and extreme temperatures.
home.faq3Q: How long does a typical installation take?
home.faq3A: A standard single-site deployment can be completed in 1–2 weeks, depending on the scope and number of systems required. This includes hardware installation, software configuration, network setup, and on-site testing. Multi-site or large-scale deployments are planned on a project-by-project basis.
home.faq4Q: Can you develop custom software for our specific requirements?
home.faq4A: Absolutely. We offer custom software development services including real-time monitoring dashboards, mobile apps, data analytics platforms, and integration with your existing enterprise systems. Our development team works closely with you to tailor solutions that match your exact operational needs.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Loading Technology Company ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website or use our services.

Information We Collect: We may collect personal information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and company name when you submit inquiries, request quotations, or register for an account. We also automatically collect certain technical data including IP addresses, browser type, and usage analytics.

How We Use Your Information: We use the information we collect to respond to your inquiries, process quotations and orders, provide customer support, improve our products and services, and send relevant communications about our IoT solutions.

Data Protection: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Your data is stored on secure servers and access is restricted to authorized personnel only.

Third-Party Sharing: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with trusted service providers who assist in operating our website and conducting our business, subject to confidentiality agreements.

Your Rights: Under the Hong Kong Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (Cap. 486), you have the right to access and correct your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at info@loadingtechnology.com.

Contact Us: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@loadingtechnology.com or call +852 9123 4567.
